## withFeature() function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function withFeature(withFeatureOptions?: IWithFeatureOptions): {
  getLoadedFeature({
    featureName,
    configName,
    runOptions,
    queryParams,
    config,
    browserContextOptions,
    tracing,
    allowedErrors,
    navigationOptions,
  }?: IFeatureExecutionOptions): Promise<{
    page: playwright.Page;
    response: playwright.Response | null;
    getMetrics: () => Promise<PerformanceMetrics>;
  }>;
};
```
